name: Numbers Reflex
description:
TAP 1 TO 100 IN 5 MINUTES OR LESS !

* Puzzles are always unique. A different game every time!
* Play everyday to improve your speed and reflexes !
* Compete in the leaderboard and earn the achievement !

Instructions:
- You must tap the numbers in order from 1 to 100.
- If you reach 100 or if you tap anything out of order the game ends!
